      • generateThumbnail

        public static void generateThumbnail(java.lang.String imagePath,
                     java.lang.String imageName,
                     java.lang.String fileExtension,
                     java.lang.String filePrefix,
                     int width,
                     int height,
                     java.awt.Color bgColor)
                              throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                     java.io.IOException,
                                     java.lang.InterruptedException
        Generates an image thumbnail filling the background with the given background color to preserve the original image ratio. If both width and height are passed as 0 then the defaults (DEFAULT_HEIGHT, DEFAULT_WIDTH) will be used
        Parameters:
        imagePath -
        imageName -
        fileExtension -
        fileOutPutSuffix -
        height - The desired resulting height, if height <= 0 the system will try to preserve the original image ratio based on the passed width
        width - The desired resulting width, if width <= 0 the system will try to preserve the original image ratio based on the passed height
        bgColor - If null then the default DEFAULT_BG_COLOR is used.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        java.io.IOException
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • generateThumbnail

        public static void generateThumbnail(java.io.InputStream input,

                     java.lang.String format,
                     int width,
                     int height,
                     java.awt.Color bgColor)

      • resizeImage

        public static void resizeImage(java.lang.String imagePath,
               java.lang.String imageName,
               java.lang.String fileExtension,
               java.lang.String fileOutPutName,
               int width,
               int height)
                        throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                               java.io.IOException,
                               java.lang.InterruptedException
        This method resizes the given image, does not preserve the aspect ratio of the image. If both passed width and height are <= 0 then the defaults will be used
        Parameters:
        imagePath - The path where is going to be the image
        imageName - The image name
        fileExtension - The image Extension
        fileOutPutName - The thumbnail name
        height - The resulting image height if height < 0 is passed then it will try to preserve the aspect ratio of the image
        width - The Image Width if width < 0 is passed then it will try to preserve the aspect ratio of the image
        bgColor - Image BackGround COlor
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        java.io.IOException
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • resizeImage
